Verses: 1 ippodho Ennilum Ilavayadhaanavargal Ennaip Pariyaasampannugiraargal; Ivargaludaiya Pidhaakkalai Naan En Mandhaiyaik Kaakkum Naaigalode Vaikkavunkooda Vetkappattiruppen.
2 viruththaappiyaththinaale Belanatruppona Avargal Kaigalinaal Enakku Enna Udhaviyirundhadhu.
3 kuraichchalinaalum Pasiyinaalum Avargal Vaadi, Vegunaalaaip Paazhum Verumaiyumaana Andharavelikku Odippoi,
4 sedigalukkul Irukkira Thazhaigalaip Pidunguvaargal; Kaattuppoondugalin Kizhangugal Avargalukku Aagaaramaayirundhadhu.
5 avargal Manusharin Naduvilirundhu Thuraththappattaargal; Kallanaith Thuraththugiradhupola Kallan Kallan Endru Avargalaith Thuraththivittaargal.
6 avargal Pallaththaakkugalin Vedippugalilum, Boomiyin Kebigalilum, Kanmalaigalilum Poi Kudiyirundhaargal.
8 avargal Moodarin Makkalum, Neesarin Pillaigalum, Dhesaththilirundhu Thuraththundavargalumaai Irundhaargal.
9 aanaalum Ippodhu Naan Avargalukkup Paattum Pazhamozhiyum Aanen.
